result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jose Luis Cruz Barrera

records.addlTxt: 3:20 PM Defendant Jose Luis Cruz Barrera appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Refugio Cuco Longoria appeared by video for Jose Luis Cruz Barrera.  Prosecuting attorney Margaret Nan Ginocchio appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Sworn Spanish interpreter Victor Gonzalez appeared by video as interpreter for defendant. Information filed, copy to Defendant, reading waived. Defendant stands mute, not guilty plea entered by Court, jury trial to be set.

9:29 AM Defendant Jose Luis Cruz Barrera appeared by video. Sworn Spanish interpreter Victor Gonzalez appeared by direct phone as interpreter for defendant.  Attorney C. James Fitzgerald appeared by video for Jose Luis Cruz Barrera.  Attorney Anne Theresa Nack appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. Sworn testimony of City of Beloit Officer Dylann Rausch. Witness identifies the defendant.  Court finds probable cause and binds Defendant over for filing of an Information.
Arraignment scheduled for October 19, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Preliminary hearing on October 10, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Activity:  Adjourned initial appearance  
Appearances by video/zoom: Court Official, Court Reporter, Court Clerk, and all Parties referenced in hearing minutes as in court.

3:00 PM  Defendant Jose Luis Cruz Barrera appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Refugio Cuco Longoria appeared by video for Jose Luis Cruz Barrera.  Prosecuting attorney Alexander David Goulart appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Preliminary hearing requested.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for October 10, 2022 at 09:30 am..
Adjourned initial appearance on September 28, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
